quizDescription.text: Assume the definition of the function normalize is rewritten as follows
Answer the next 3 questions based on this code.

questions.questionText: Which condition does the line assert(max_number != 0) correspond to?
Which condition does the line assert(0.0 <= numbers[i] <= 1.0) correspond to?
What does the function call normalize([0, 0, 0]) print out?
